snippet.title: Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley | Gameplay Trailer | Future Games Show June 2022
snippet.description:
Enjoy this new trailer for the adorable Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley, coming to Steam in 2023 with classic characters in a musical adventure game where you restore harmony and balance to Moominvalley from the Park Keeper.

Our Socials - YouTube: www.youtube.com/GamesRadar
Twitter: www.twitter.com/FutureGamesShow
Facebook: www.facebook.com.GamesRadar
Twitch: www.twitch.tv/GamesRadar
